alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Geauga; Lake; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Trumbull, Geauga, southeastern Lake and southwestern Ashtabula Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 430 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chesterland to near Middlefield. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Painesville, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Mentor, Middlefield, North Bloomfield, Orwell, Burton, West Farmington, Chesterland, Willoughby Hills, Kirtland, Huntsburg, Claridon, Gates Mills, Montville, Hartsgrove, Roaming Shores, Cherry Valley and Hunting Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
